snippet: The Yayoi Kusama retrospective at the Whitney Museum of American Art goes beyond this Japanese artist’s best-known work from her decade-plus stay in the United States to include some of her most complex and personal pieces.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews retrospective of work by Japanese artist Yayoi Kusama at the Whitney Museum of American Art.
lead_paragraph: The Yayoi Kusama retrospective at the Whitney Museum of American Art goes beyond this Japanese artist’s best-known work from her decade-plus stay in the United States to include some of her most complex and personal pieces.

headline.seo: Yayoi Kusama at Whitney Museum of American Art
headline.main: Vivid Hallucinations From a Fragile Life
headline.print_headline: Vivid Hallucinations From a Fragile Life
